titles.title: RISE Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable tax credit for certain teachers as a supplement to State efforts to provide teachers with a livable wage.
Rightfully Investing in Supporting Educators Act
RISE Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Rightfully Investing in Supporting Educators Act or the RISE Act
This bill allows a refundable tax credit for certain elementary school teachers, secondary school teachers, and early childhood educators who teach low-income students.
